title: Thematic Analysis-Based Curriculum to Improve Higher Education Learning Behaviors and Pedagogical Knowledge [Large-Scale]

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate expertise in scientific fields and understanding of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Small-Group Interactive Learning Environment Focused on Formative Assessment Using Digital Devices for In-Service Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design learning strategies in scientific domains by applying thematic analysis methods.
Learners can identify and present at least three self-regulated learning strategies to analyze and improve their learning behaviors in higher education settings.
Learners can visually represent instructional knowledge using digital tools and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
